block.p: A selective listing of state, county and local government events across New Jersey this week. (All dates and times subject to confirmation.) Items should be submitted by mail at least three weeks in advance to the New Jersey Op-Ed Page, The New York Times, 229 West 43rd Street, New York, N.Y. 10036, or by e-mail to njcivic@nytimes.com.
State of New Jersey

Trenton Senate Budget and Appropriations. Monday at 10 a.m. State House Annex Building, 150 West State Street. (609) 292-4840. Trenton Senate Judiciary. Monday at 10 a.m. State House Annex Building, 150 West State Street. (609) 292-4840.
Atlantic County
Northfield Board of Chosen Freeholders. Tuesday at 4 p.m. Stillwater Building, 201 South Shore Road. (609) 645-5900.
Bergen County

Dumont Mayor and Council. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Dumont Borough Hall, 50 Washington Avenue. (201) 387-5022. Hackensack City Council and Committee of the Whole. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Hackensack City Hall, 65 Central Avenue. (201) 646-3980. Mahwah Board of Adjustment. Wednesday at 8 p.m. Mahwah Municipal Building, 475 Corporate Drive. (201) 529-5757.
Burlington County
Marlton Township Council. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Evesham Municipal Building, 984 Tuckerton Road. (856) 983-2900.
Camden County
Atco Board of Chosen Freeholders. Tuesday at 7 p.m. South County Library, 35 Coopers Folly Road. (856) 225-5586.
Cumberland County
Bridgeton City Council. Tuesday at 6:30 p.m. Bridgeton City Hall, 181 East Commerce Street. (856) 455-3230.
Essex County
Roseland Environmental Commission. Wednesday at 8 p.m. Roseland Borough Hall, 19 Harrison Avenue. (973) 226-8080.
Hudson County
Hoboken City Council. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Hoboken City Hall, 94 Washington Street. (201) 420-2070.
Hunterdon County

Flemington Committee on Disability Services. Tuesday at 10 a.m. Hunterdon County Division of Social Services, Building 2, Route 31. (908) 788-1253. Weehawken Planning Board. Tuesday at 8 p.m. Weehawken Town Hall, 400 Park Avenue. (201) 319-6005.
Mercer County
Princeton Town meeting. Monday at 7 p.m. Princeton Town Council, 400 Witherspoon Street. (609) 924-5704.
Monmouth County
Lake Como Board of Education. Monday at 9 p.m. Lake Como Municipal Building, 1740 Main Street. (732) 681-3232.
Morris County

Morristown Planning Board. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. 30 Schuyler Place. (973) 829-8120. Morristown County Senior Citizens and Disabled Residents Transportation Advisory Committee. Thursday at 1:30 p.m. 30 Schuyler Place. (973) 285-6000.
Ocean County
Toms River Board of Chosen Freeholders. Wednesday at 4 p.m. Ocean County Administration Building, 101 Hooper Avenue. (732) 244-2121.
Passaic County

Haledon Mayor and Council. Thursday at 7 p.m. Haledon Municipal Building, 510 Belmont Avenue. (973) 595-7766, ext. 103. Paterson Planning Board. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Paterson City Hall, 155 Market Street. (973) 321-1500. Pompton Lakes Planning Board. Tuesday at 8 p.m. Pompton Lakes Borough Hall, 25 Lenox Avenue. (973) 835-0143.
Somerset County
Green Brook Township Committee. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Green Brook Municipal Building, 111 Greenbrook Road. (732) 968-1023, ext. 6602.
Sussex County
Stanhope Mayor and Council. Monday at 8 p.m. Byram Municipal Building, 10 Mansfield Drive. (973) 948-5400.
Union County

Fanwood Planning Board. Monday at 7 p.m. Fanwood Borough Hall, 75 North Martine Avenue. (908) 322-8236. Linden Municipal Council. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Linden City Hall, 301 North Wood Avenue. (908) 474-8452. New Providence Planning Board. Tuesday at 8 p.m. New Providence Municipal Center, 360 Elkwood Avenue. (908) 665-1400. Springfield Environmental Commission. Monday at 8 p.m. Township of Springfield Municipal Building, 100 Mountain Avenue. (973) 912-2200.
Warren County

Alpha Planning Board. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Alpha Municipal Building, 1001 East Boulevard. (908) 454-0088. Johnsonburg Township Committee. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Frelinghuysen Township Building, 210 Route 661. (908) 852-4121. Port Murray Planning Board. Monday at 8 p.m. Mansfield Township Building, 100 Port Murray Road. (908) 689-6151, ext. 211.
